## GLOBAL\_MIDDLEWARE\_INTERCEPTOR\_NAMESPACE variable

Default namespace for Express middleware based global interceptors

**Signature:**

```typescript
GLOBAL_MIDDLEWARE_INTERCEPTOR_NAMESPACE = "globalInterceptors.middleware"
```
